Words.english: I wake up early every morning.
Words.italian: Io mi sveglio presto ogni mattina.

Words.english: You always get up late on weekends.
Words.italian: Tu ti alzi sempre tardi nei weekend.

Words.english: He lies down on the sofa after work.
Words.italian: Lui si corica sul divano dopo il lavoro.

Words.english: She showers before going out.
Words.italian: Lei si fa la doccia prima di uscire.

Words.english: We wash ourselves before lunch.
Words.italian: Noi ci laviamo prima di pranzo.

Words.english: You all sit at the table for dinner.
Words.italian: Voi vi sedete al tavolo per cena.

Words.english: They comb themselves in front of the mirror.
Words.italian: Loro si pettinano davanti allo specchio.

Words.english: I dress myself quickly in the morning.
Words.italian: Io mi vesto velocemente al mattino.

Words.english: You usually shave yourself before going out.
Words.italian: Tu ti sbarbi di solito prima di uscire.

Words.english: He always cleans himself thoroughly.
Words.italian: Lui si pulisce sempre accuratamente.

Words.english: She undresses herself before taking a shower.
Words.italian: Lei si spoglia prima di fare la doccia.

Words.english: We turn ourselves around to see better.
Words.italian: Noi ci voltiamo per vedere meglio.

Words.english: You all get up as soon as the alarm rings.
Words.italian: Voi vi alzate appena suona la sveglia.

Words.english: They call themselves by their nicknames.
Words.italian: Loro si chiamano con i loro soprannomi.

Words.english: I sit on the bench to rest.
Words.italian: Io mi siedo sulla panchina per riposare.

Words.english: You comb yourself before going to the party.
Words.italian: Tu ti pettini prima di andare alla festa.

Words.english: He dresses himself elegantly for the occasion.
Words.italian: Lui si veste elegantemente per l'occasione.

Words.english: She wakes up early to go jogging.
Words.italian: Lei si sveglia presto per andare a fare jogging.

Words.english: We shower ourselves after the workout.
Words.italian: Noi ci facciamo la doccia dopo l'allenamento.

Words.english: You all wash yourselves before going to bed.
Words.italian: Voi vi lavate prima di andare a letto.

Words.english: They shave themselves carefully with a razor.
Words.italian: Loro si sbarbano con cura con un rasoio.

Words.english: I lie down on the grass to relax.
Words.italian: Io mi corico sull'erba per rilassarmi.

Words.english: You sit at the computer to work.
Words.italian: Tu ti siedi al computer per lavorare.

Words.english: He turns himself around to see who's calling.
Words.italian: Lui si volta per vedere chi sta chiamando.

Words.english: She cleans herself before going out with friends.
Words.italian: Lei si pulisce prima di uscire con gli amici.

Words.english: We dress ourselves warmly for the winter.
Words.italian: Noi ci vestiamo caldamente per l'inverno.

Words.english: You all wash yourselves quickly in the morning.
Words.italian: Voi vi lavate velocemente al mattino.

Words.english: They get up early to catch the train.
Words.italian: Loro si alzano presto per prendere il treno.

Words.english: I shower myself after the gym session.
Words.italian: Io mi faccio la doccia dopo la sessione in palestra.
